result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.
result.ga: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.orig: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.html: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an ḃliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: She went overseas looking for work.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.orig: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibre
result.html: Chuaigh sí thar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí ṫar lear ag lorg oibreShe went overseas looking for work.

result.eng: He put on his work clothes.
result.ga: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.orig: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.html: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibreHe put on his work clothes.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé uime a ċulaiṫ oibreHe put on his work clothes.

result.eng: We will dispatch your order within three working days.
result.ga: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibre
result.orig: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibre
result.html: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibreWe will dispatch your order within three working days.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfimid d'ordú ċun bealaiġ laistiġ de ṫrí lá oibreWe will dispatch your order within three working days.

result.eng: I didn't get recognition for my work.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibre
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibre
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibreI didn't get recognition for my work.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé aiṫeantas as mo ċuid oibreI didn't get recognition for my work.

result.eng: The train goes directly from my house to my workplace.
result.ga: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibre
result.orig: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibre
result.html: Tá an traein ag dul díreach ó mo theach go dtí mo láthair oibreThe train goes directly from my house to my workplace.
result.ponchtml: Tá an traein ag dul díreaċ ó mo ṫeaċ go dtí mo láṫair oibreThe train goes directly from my house to my workplace.

result.ga: Tá meas agam ar do chuid oibre
result.orig: Tá meas agam ar do chuid oibre
result.html: Tá meas agam ar do chuid oibreI admire your work.
result.ponchtml: Tá meas agam ar do ċuid oibreI admire your work.

result.eng: A lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ga: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.orig: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainn
result.html: Tá neart oibre fós le déanamh sna blianta amach romhainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart oibre fós le déanaṁ sna blianta amaċ roṁainnA lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.

result.eng: I did a great day's work today.
result.html: Rinne mé an-lá oibre inniuI did a great day's work today.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé an-lá oibre inniuI did a great day's work today.

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
